document.text:
From: 
Subject: 
RE: Brass memos 
Date: Mon, 05 Aug 2019 20:41:03 +0000 
Attachments: 
combined.brass.memolonag.meet.gsb.recused.focx.docx; 
brass.memo.for.ag.meet.w.gsb.docx; SDNY_Memo_to_DAG.GSB.cases.5.23.19.final.pdf; 
SDNY_Memo_to_DAGnGSB_Recused.5.23.19.Finaldocx.pdf 
I don't think we've done update memos for Geoff and since February. Those are attached. We have since 
done shorter update memos for the DAG, most recently in May. 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 5, 2019 2:03 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Brass memos 
Would you mind sending us the final version of the most recent update memos on these investigations? I know in some 
cases they were part of a larger memo. I don't think we have the final draft in some instances. 
From 
Sent: Monday, August 5, 2019 12:32 PM 
To: 
Subject: Brass memos 
All — 
Geoff has to brief the AG on various cases next week, to potentially include As of now we do not 
need to do memos for the AG, but Geoff would like fairly meaty briefing memos on these matters. Some of them you 
have already done, so they can be supplemented/revised as appropriate — find one of us to discuss or answer any 
questions. We would like them from you by Wednesday if possible so that we can get them to Geoff by Thursday night or 
Friday. That sound okay? 
United States Attorney's Office for the 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00022617

EFTA00022618
